paragraphs.text: Coming soon: Fifty Shades of Ironing.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: As anyone who has been in a card shop lately will know, Valentine's Day is almost upon us
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Like the petals of the mutabilis rose, still blooming in this global warming winter, the envelopes have turned from Christmas crimson to infatuated fuchsia
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The plush reindeer have been stabled in the stock room, replaced by shelves of bears, declarations of love stitched to their torsos in the colour of blood
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: An Italian importer has started supplying to UK pubs a range of heart-shaped ravioli stuffed with cheese, tomato and basil, which can be reheated from frozen and cost? 30 per 3kg pack
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: And
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: you thought Valentine's Day couldn't get more romantic
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: here comes Fifty Shades of Grey, the movie version of EL James's sex slave saga, released just in time on Friday the 13th
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will it score or will it flop?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The auguries are good
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Fifty Shades is the bestselling book in Britain since records began
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: more than 100m copies have been flogged worldwide
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: The trailer for the film was the most-watched on YouTube last year, beating even Star Wars
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: Yet until recently I was sceptical
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: After all
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: books and trailers can be consumed with relative privacy
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: To see a movie legally you must leave your house, queue up, ask someone for a ticket and then sit down in the company of others
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: And
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: unlike, say, Basic Instinct and 9 1/2 weeks, Fifty Shades is not couples-friendly softcore, but specifically aimed at one gender
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even the most tolerant boyfriend would balk
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will women go solo?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: With girlfriends?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Might
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it be another Mamma Mia!
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: - still the highest grossing musical movie ever - with vast parties of galpals going again and again?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Surely not
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But the journey to work over the past few days has made me realise what an outmoded prude I am
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: It is no longer considered inappropriate for people - women, anyway - to openly consume porn in public
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I had ascribed Fifty Shades's popularity to the rise of the e-reader, with its brown paper wrapping of propriety
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But many commuters have their nose in the book itself, bondage cover on proud display, enjoying erotica in what might seem to be strikingly unsexy surroundings
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Perhaps this isn't about porn
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Maybe it's just a general slippage in inhibition
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: People seem happy enough to eat their breakfast and apply mascara with a stranger's thighs a couple of inches from their face
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: to treat the whole bus to their intimate phone calls
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Perhaps it's not arrogance, but practicality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: no one has enough time or space anymore
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What you used to do in the bathroom or bedroom you now do on the commute
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I need to make it work for me
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Porn and sandwiches will take some getting used to
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I often struggle to get all my ironing done at home - and frequently travel on trains equipped with plugs and what I suspect are heat-resistant tables
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: ... though in its way that could be a world of pain too
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Last week my backlog of creased clothes was so enormous I went to the sales to buy new ones
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The crowds were a doddle compared with the bleak epiphany of the changing room mirror
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: A diet is clearly essential
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Likewise a wholescale rethink of hair and even face, plus radical fitness regime, implemented ASAP
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: At the moment I favour the Serena Williams method
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: with defeat looming in a match on Tuesday, she ordered a coffee mid-game and went on to thrash her opponent
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: No vitamin bars
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: No isotonic drinks
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: No complex stretches
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Just coffee
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I can do that
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Perhaps it's just the clothes that got small- endless frocks ruined by the wrong wash option
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Lucky, then, that this week electronics giant LG unveiled a swanky machine which runs two cycles simultaneously: hot cottons up top, cooler smalls below
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: "Today's busy families consider laundry to be less like a chore and more like a chess match," explained LG's David VanderWaal
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: The statement is at once baffling and patronising
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: exactly what you'd expect from a firm that programmes its TVs to tell their owners "Life's Good" each time they turn them on
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I still can't get used to this
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it always provokes a little stab of despair
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: as if you're trapped in a future so terrible that even household gadgets have been deputed to encourage you not to top yourself
paragraphs.label: assumption
